Vitureyyati，at J．V，47 is not clear．The v．l．is vitariyati； the C．expls by tuleti tīreti，i．e．contemplates，examines．Kern，Toev．s．v．discusses it in detail & proposes writing vituriyata （3rd sg．praet．med．），& expls at “get over” [cp．Vedic tūryati overcome，fr．tur or tvar=P．tarati2]．Dutoit trsls “überstieg．” （Page 620）
